Tuesday, Jan 10, 2017. 
"The law is the law, until it gets changed."
Help us change the law @PMalinauskasMP.
Legally approved patients need to be permitted to grow their own #cannabis. You can help us. Will you?
#SAPARLI #HomeGrowAmnesty #Cancer #Epilepsy #Crohns #ChronicPain #MS https://t.co/r3vbbjkDo2
